channel.title: Fun on Development: people, code & me
channel.description: Recent content in Fun on Development: people, code & me

item.title: Console.WriteLine( "Hello, World!" );
item.description: Every single experiment I did as a programmer began in this way: show Hello, World! on the monitor. Therefore I decided to start this new experiment (writing a blog) in the same way. Who knows me well can tell that I never did my best in humanities, therefore “writing a blog” is not exactly in my style. However, I strongly believe that sharing experiences is essential in my job for two main reasons:
